strictQuotes

public CSV.Builder strictQuotes()
Constructs CSVBuilder. Characters outside the quotes will be ignored.

notStrictQuotes

public CSV.Builder notStrictQuotes()
Constructs CSVBuilder. Characters outside the quotes will not be ignored.

ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace

public CSV.Builder ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace()
Constructs CSVBuilder. White space before a quote in a field will be ignored.

notIgnoreLeadingWhiteSpace

public CSV.Builder notIgnoreLeadingWhiteSpace()
Constructs CSVBuilder. White space before a quote in a field will not be ignored.
